Dragon's Wrath.name: Dragon's Wrath
Dragon's Wrath.flavor: You exhale draconic energy that detonates at a distance.
Dragon's Wrath.attack:
Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity + 4 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity + 6 vs. Reflex
Dragon's Wrath.special: This power uses the same ability as your dragon breath racial power, and it uses the same damage type you initially chose for that power.

Dragon Wings.name: Dragon Wings
Dragon Wings.flavor: Fully formed dragon wings protrude from your back, giving you the ability to fly.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your speed. You must land at the end of this movement.
Dragon Wings.effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your speed. You must land at the end of this movement.

Clinging Breath.name: Clinging Breath
Clinging Breath.flavor: Your breath weapon clings to creatures before you, eating them alive.
Clinging Breath.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity + 6 vs. Reflex
Clinging Breath.onHit: 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Clinging Breath.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Clinging Breath.special: This power uses the same ability as your dragon breath racial power, and it uses the same damage type you initially chose for that power.
